org.lestaxinomes.les_taxinomes_android.dataConnexion

Interface ConnexionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XMLRPCConnexionManager

    public interface ConnexionManager
    Interface for the connexion to the database
    Author:
    Marie

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void authenticate(UserModel userModel)
      Try to connect with login/password, if successful load the data of the logged author in userModel.author
      void createMedia(CreateMediaModel createMediaModel)
      Creates a new media in the database from the createMediaModel.media and updates it with the generated id
      void loadAuthor(AuthorModel authorModel)
      Load the author from authorModel.author.id, updates authorMode.author with the result, and updates the corresponding views
      void loadLicences(LicenceModel licenceModel)
      Loads the license list and store it in the model
      void loadMedia(MediaModel mediaModel)
      Loads the media from the mediaModel.media.id, updates mediaModel.media with the result, and updates the corresponding views
      void loadMediaFullDocument(MediaFullDocumentModel mediaFullDocumentModel)
      Loads the media with full size document and updates the corresponding view
      void loadMediaList(MediaListModel mediaListModel)
      Load the mediaList from the criteriaMap and populate the list view

    • Method Detail

      • loadMedia

        void loadMedia(MediaModel mediaModel)
        Loads the media from the mediaModel.media.id, updates mediaModel.media with the result, and updates the corresponding views
        Parameters:
        mediaModel - the model containing a media with a mediaId

      • loadMediaFullDocument

        void loadMediaFullDocument(MediaFullDocumentModel mediaFullDocumentModel)
        Loads the media with full size document and updates the corresponding view
        Parameters:
        mediaFullDocumentModel - the model containing a media with a mediaId

      • loadMediaList

        void loadMediaList(MediaListModel mediaListModel)
        Load the mediaList from the criteriaMap and populate the list view
        Parameters:
        mediaListModel - the model containing a map of criteres

      • loadAuthor

        void loadAuthor(AuthorModel authorModel)
        Load the author from authorModel.author.id, updates authorMode.author with the result, and updates the corresponding views
        Parameters:
        authorModel - the model containing an Author with an ID

      • authenticate

        void authenticate(UserModel userModel)
        Try to connect with login/password, if successful load the data of the logged author in userModel.author
        Parameters:
        userModel - the model containing login/password

      • createMedia

        void createMedia(CreateMediaModel createMediaModel)
        Creates a new media in the database from the createMediaModel.media and updates it with the generated id
        Parameters:
        createMediaModel - the model containing the data of the media to create

      • loadLicences

        void loadLicences(LicenceModel licenceModel)
        Loads the license list and store it in the model
        Parameters:
        licenceModel - the model containing the license list for storing the result
